Status: Lvl 1 Fighter | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300 | Gold: 10gp","resources":"HD: 1/1 | Second Wind: 1/1 | Exhaustion: 0","narrative":"Morning (08:00:00) in a small, featureless room—the stone walls are cold and bare, illuminated by pale light filtering through a narrow window set high in the eastern wall. Dust motes drift lazily in the shaft of sunlight. A single wooden door stands shut before you, its iron handle tarnished with age.

You stand in the center of the chamber, your leather armor creaking softly as you survey your surroundings. The air smells of old stone and something faintly metallic—perhaps blood, perhaps rust. Your hand rests instinctively on the hilt of your longsword, the familiar grip grounding you in this unfamiliar place.

You have no memory of how you arrived here. Only the vague impression of... something. A voice? A flash of light? The details slip away like water through your fingers.
